com.googlecode.genericdao.search.IMutableSearch

  • Packages that use IMutableSearch 
    Package Description
    com.googlecode.genericdao.search  

    • Uses of IMutableSearch in com.googlecode.genericdao.search

      Classes in com.googlecode.genericdao.search that implement IMutableSearch 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Search
      A convenient fully-featured implementation of ISearch and IMutableSearch for general use in Java code.
      Methods in com.googlecode.genericdao.search with type parameters of type IMutableSearch
